title: Copula Variational LSTM for High-dimensional Cross-market Multivariate Dependence Modeling. (arXiv:2305.08778v1 [q-fin.ST])
abstract: We address an important yet challenging problem - modeling high-dimensional dependencies across multivariates such as financial indicators in heterogeneous markets. In reality, a market couples and influences others over time, and the financial variables of a market are also coupled. We make the first attempt to integrate variational sequential neural learning with copula-based dependence modeling to characterize both temporal observable and latent variable-based dependence degrees and structures across non-normal multivariates. Our variational neural network WPVC-VLSTM models variational sequential dependence degrees and structures across multivariate time series by variational long short-term memory networks and regular vine copula. The regular vine copula models nonnormal and long-range distributional couplings across multiple dynamic variables. translated_title: 针对异质市场中高维跨市场多变量依赖建模的Copula变分LSTM
translated_abstract: 本文解决了一个重要而具有挑战性的问题——建模异质市场中金融指标等多变量之间的高维依赖关系。在现实中，一个市场随时间发展不断影响其他市场，并且一个市场的金融变量也存在耦合关系。我们首次尝试将变分顺序神经学习与基于Copula的依赖建模相结合，以描述跨非正常多变量的时间可观测和潜在变量的依赖程度和结构。我们的变分神经网络WPVC-VLSTM通过变分长短期记忆网络和常规藤Copula对多元时间序列中的变分序列依赖程度和结构进行建模。常规藤Copula对多个动态变量之间的非正态和长程分布耦合进行建模。WPVC-VLSTM在技术显著性和组合预测性能方面得到验证。它优于包括l在内的基准模型。
tldr: 本文提出了一种新的方法——Copula变分LSTM，用于建模异质市场中金融指标等多变量之间的高维依赖关系，并在组合预测中表现出色。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a new approach, Copula Variational LSTM, for modeling high-dimensional dependencies across multivariates in heterogeneous markets, which outperforms benchmark models in portfolio forecasting. The approach integrates variational sequential neural learning with copula-based dependence modeling to characterize both temporal observable and latent variable-based dependence degrees and structures across non-normal multivariates.
